Experimental design Genomics Sequences

Illumina PE150 4.2 4.2

Analysis Process 3 Illumina DNA-Seq Gene families 1 FastQC
Tissues (Mussel） Quality Control Family expansion and contraction
Illumina DNA-Seq HiCUP Truncater Phylogenetic analysis 5
Quality Control Time of species divergence HiCUP Mapper
HiCUP Genome size HiCUP Filter Positive selection analysis Genome pollution Genome heterozygosity HiCUP Deduplicator 4
Genome Annotation Di-Tags
2 ALLHiC Contig/Scaffold PacBio SMRT-Seq
Chromosomes Polymerase Reads
HiFi Reads 1. BUSCO评估: 使用tblastn、augustus 、hmmer比对基 Hifiasm 因组到单拷贝直系同源基因库 Contig (N50) 2. CEGMA 评估: 使用tblastn、genewise、geneid比对基
因组到6个真核模式生物中的248个保守基因构成的 Scaffold (N50) Core Gene库 3. 序列一致性: 使用BWA 比对Illumina Reads到组装的 Assembly evaluation 基因组，计算覆盖率和比对率

Experimental design WES-Seq (Whole Exome Sequencing)
1. Samples-Tissues
Enrichment of DNA sequences in exon regions using probe
hybridization 2. 3. DNA Library Region 180bp~280bp Total >= 0.4 μg Agilent SureSelect Platform
4. Illumina PE150 Illumina PE150 Q30>=80% 5. Bioinformatics Analysis

SNP / InDel / CNV detection, annotation and GATK4 statistics

Experimental design Eukaryotic reference transcriptome
1. Clipping Samples 2. mRNA: Tissues 5’ UnTranslated Region, (UTR)
3’ Seq AAUAAA, (polyA)
5. PolyT Enrichment Extracting
4. Remove rRNA
3. RNA (mRNA, rRNA, tRNA, ncRNA) rRNA is 82% in all RNA.
1.mRNA: Message RNA 6. mRNA 2.tRNA: Translate RNA
3.rRNA: Ribosomal RNA 4.ncRNA: No Code RNA

16S、18S、ITS Sequences
"S" (settling speed) represents a measure of the settling speed, not the mass. The sedimentation speed of each subunit is affected by both its shape and its mass.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a total of 70S containing 23S, 16S and 5S.
Eukaryotic ribosomes have a total of 80S, including 28S, 18S, Microbial transcriptome 3. 5.8S and 5S. sequencing Microorganis
m Microbial transcriptome sequencing technology is a method for sequencing single Metagenomic Sequencing colony microbial transcripts.
Metagenomic sequencing is a method that uses high-throughput sequencing technology to complete the detection and functional analysis of the genomes of all species in the microbial community.

Experimental design
1. Microbial community 1.
Microbial community
Concentration>=5ng/μL Total>=150ng Total>=200ng 2. 2. DNA DNA
3. PCR amplify 16S Add adapter 3. DNA Library DNA Library 16S Seq Metagenomics 1.DNA Fragments 2.Add adapter to two ends 3.350bp library
4. Sequences 4. Ion S5 XL Platform Sequences NovaSeq 6000 Platform Illumina Sequences platform PE250/SE400 PE150
5. 5. Bioinformatics Analysis Bioinformatics Analysis

Metabolomics

small molecule compounds (molecular Targeted metabolomics targeted AB Sciex QTRAP® 4500 LC-MS/MS
weight less than 1000) in biological analysis of a single or a small amount Database of primary and secondary
samples。 of target metabolites in biological metabolites (more than 2,200 substances) Medical metabolite database (more than samples, and the absolute abundance 1500 substances)
information of target metabolites
obtained by comparison analysis with standards。
